title: Taylor Swift had us all in our feels with her SNL performance of Lover
text:
The show was hosted by Phoebe Waller-Bridge (Picture: NBC)

Taylor Swift gave us all a touching stripped-down performance of her new song Lover on Saturday Night Live.

The 29-year-old singer took the stage to sing a new ballad version of her huge hit on Saturday evening and we’re all in our feels.

She sang on an all-green set and had pieces of paper hanging behind her prompting some fans to speculate that it represents the ‘hundred thrown-out speeches I almost said to you’ in The Archer.

Taylor surprised her fans with a performance of False God which is a song she had not performed on TV before.

Meanwhile, she also tried her hand at her best British accent alongside Phoebe Waller-Bridge who was hosting the night.

The episode was Phoebe’s first as host, while Taylor has been a recurring guest on the show, first appearing in 2009.

Taylor decided to attempt her best British accent – she is currently dating British actor, Joe Alwyn, after all.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘It’s gonna be mental innit?’ Taylor says. ‘Like a randy hen… did you write this?’

‘Yeah sorry,’ Phoebe replies. ‘It’s too British isn’t it?’

Taylor responds, ‘a little bit,’ before the pair turn away from each other.

The singer recently had laser eye surgery and got upset when she accidentally chose the wrong banana.

Her recent procedure was revealed by her mum, who shared a hilarious video of her recovery with The Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon.

Broadcasting the clip to viewers, Jimmy literally couldn’t contain his laughter – as blushing Taylor looked all kinds of embarrassed.

But at least now, the star says, she ‘really can see very well.’ So the high fashion goggles were worth it, Tay Tay.

Phoebe was a natural host as well (Picture: NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images)

In the video, Taylor struggles to hold back the tears as she selects the wrong banana (‘This isn’t the one I wanted!’) and then tries not to fall asleep

Unbeknownst to her, her mum is filming all the whining. She then secretly gave the tape to Fallon to surprise her daughter with.

Are they really your mum if they’re not constantly trying to embarrass you?

description: Singer Taylor Swift appeared on Saturday Night Live to sing the song Lover from her latest album.
